General.Name: abrdn Property Income Trust Ltd.
General.Description: The objective of abrdn Property Income Trust Limited is to provide shareholders with an attractive level of income together with the prospect of income and capital growth. The Board intends to achieve the investment objective by investing in a diversified portfolio of UK commercial properties in the industrial, office, retail and "other' sectors, where "other' includes leisure, data centres, student housing, hotels (and apart-hotels) and healthcare. Investment in property development and investment in co-investment vehicles, where there is more than one investor, is permitted up to a maximum of 10% of the property portfolio.
General.Address: Trafalgar Court, Saint Peter Port, United Kingdom, GY1 3QL
